Name: Stonehide Lawachurl
Title: "Vale-Crosser" Stonehide Lawachurl
Desc: Go around â€” the way ahead is the realm of the "king."
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Stonehide Lawachurl

26014.Name: Infused Stonehide
26014.Desc: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C126011]</color> and <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C126012]</color>.

C126011.Name: Stonehide
C126011.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached takes DMG: </color>Decrease 1 DMG. When $[K106] is decreased, consume 1 additional $[K3].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 3</color>

K106.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>
K106.Desc:
Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Hydro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Pyro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

C126012.Name: Stone Force
C126012.Desc: The character to which this is attached has their $[K100] dealt converted to $[K106].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Once per Round:</color> The character deals +1 DMG.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Once the $[C126011] attached to the character is removed</color>, this status will be removed alongside it.

K100.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>
K100.Desc: Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.

K106.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>
K106.Desc:
Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Hydro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
